feels.name: Excitement
feels.quote: Such a piece of gaiety was going to happen as had not been seen or known of since Wombwell’s lions came, when one of them ate a little child’s arm.

feels.name: Disappointment
feels.quote: It was in vain that I twirled the cap round on my hand to exhibit back and side fronts: her heart had been set upon a turban.

causedBy.name: Receiving a cap instead of a turban

feels.name: Resignation
feels.quote: It is just like the caps all the ladies in Cranford are wearing, and they have had theirs for a year, I dare say.

feels.name: Anxiety
feels.quote: I was very glad to accept the invitation from my dear Miss Matty, independently of the conjuror.

Places.name: Cranford
Places.description: A small town where the events take place.

Places.name: Miss Matty's Bedroom
Places.description: Where Miss Matty and the protagonist discuss the cap.
